text: kitaab (karmapatrika) rakhee jaegee to aparaadhiyon ko dekhonge ki jo kuchh usamen hoga usase dar rahe hai aur kah rahe hai, "haay, hamaara durbhaagy! yah kaisee kitaab hai ki yah na koee chhotee baat chhodatee hai na badee, balki sabhee ko isane apane andar samaahit kar rakha hai." jo kuchh unhonne kiya hoga sab maujood paenge. tumhaara rab kisee par zulm na karega
